page.title: 20COMPUTER SHOP IN BRIGG
page.content: Mrs Sharon Chubb, my mum, owns Brigg Computer Centre. It is quite a spacious shop with a friendly atmosphere. The skirting boards and the door are painted bright poppy red while the walls are painted a creamy colour. It opens every morning at l0 am and closes at lpm for lunch. In the afternoon it opens at 2.l5 pm and closes at 5.3O pm. The profit is quite good and my mummy enjoys being there. The shop is closed on Wednesday and for half a day on Monday. The phone is well used everyday with mummy ordering things. She has an assitant called Paul Moss who helps a lot. Some days Paul Moss's mother comes in while mummy is away on business. Anybody is welcome there.
